description.db:para: This table is used by the Dynamic Routing module to define carriers (a carrier is defined by a list of gateways and an ordering rule). More information can be found at: &OPENSIPS_MOD_DOC;drouting.html.

column.name: id
column.description: Table key, not used by module

column.name: gwlist
column.description: Reference to the GWs/destinations from the list.

column.name: flags
column.description: Flags (for different purposes) of the carriers

column.name: description
column.description: Text description of the GW list
